item.title: How to help with aligning AI
item.description: Nonlinear’s list of resources How to pursue a career in technical AI alignment by Charlie Rogers-Smith AI safety ideas To learn more about [[notes/Why aligning AI matters|why AI alignment matters]], check out the AGI Safety Fundamentals course by EA Cambridge.

item.title: Why 'aligning' AI matters
item.description: Humans are smart, machines could be even smarter, super-smart machines means big changes, and those changes might not be good.

item.title: Inadequacy
item.description: “I am completely inept and inadequate at all the things I’m trying to do.” That’s a thought I had a few days ago.

item.title: Digital gardens
item.description: I recently came across a bunch of websites doing something interesting: People are sharing their personal notes (often Obsidian vaults), or a curated collection of them, publicly on the internet, on their own websites.
